abstract: Atlah Worldwide Church in Harlem continues to garner public attention and outrage for its incendiary anti-gay messages on large outdoor sign; recent message celebrated court ruling to block imminent foreclosure, as church has been in legal battle with city for more than decade over charges it owes back payment on water and sewage bills.
lead_paragraph: After the Atlah Worldwide Church won a court ruling in a long-running legal dispute, a sign outside said it would celebrate by burning a rainbow flag in the building’s courtyard.

headline.main: Avoiding Foreclosure for Now, Harlem Church Celebrates With Anti-Gay Vitriol
headline.print_headline: Church in Harlem Celebrates Survival With Anti-Gay Sign
